answers.answer: I too love salad, veggies,  and tons of fruit.   I don't eat sweets, breads, or junk.  I stopped drinking soda years before i got pregnant and I'm so sad that i now have gestational diabetes.   Sorry to be a downer on you great post but I'm just sad.
That's all good I will most likely get that to size I'm. A plus size mummy and also runs on my side and hubby'sI'm having a hard time with my 1at trimester do I understand the sad feeling

I just wrote a similar post last night about this. All I've been craving is healthy foods like fruits, veggies and juice. I'm glad my baby likes healthy foods but I miss my sweets and soda, today we're the first things she decided had to go.
At least our babies will like healthy food.. I don't want to pass on my eating habits

I was having the same cravings with this pregnancy i loved anything realated to fruits wich i hated b4 like i could live with out.. But all this pregnancy i was eating fruits veg salads avacado..and they say if thats what ur craving it means ur having a girl witch i am!! What about u ladies?

title: Healthy craving
